long_description: The thirtytwo Boa(R) snowboard boots for kids offer an easy way for them to secure their boots closed. They'll love the convenience and comfort; you'll love the price. Soft-flexing boots offer support and comfort for any kid and all types of riding. Boa lacing offers on-the-fly micro adjustments and never comes untied; you get quick on and off, and consistent closure without pressure points. Integrated EVA foam liners hold feet tight and keep them warm. Durable rubber outsoles with EVA cushioning provide all-day comfort and support during landings.
short_description: The thirtytwo Boa(R) snowboard boots for kids offer an easy way for them to secure their boots closed. They'll love the convenience and comfort; you'll love the price.
